title: CLDF dataset derived from Blum et al.'s "A Comparative Wordlist for Investigating Distant Relations Among Languages in Lowland South America (forthcoming).
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Blum, Frederic and Barrientos, Carlos and Zariquiey, Roberto and List, Johann-Mattis. Forthcoming. A Comparative Wordlist for Investigating Distant Relations Among Languages in Lowland South America.
